definition.text: Superalgos is constantly evolving, growing, and getting stronger. I heard this through the grapevine, I mean, on the Superalgos Develop group...

paragraphs.text: With upcoming versions of Superalgos, you will be able to train a new type of Learning Bot running a reinforcement learning algorithm! You will feed the bot with data mined from any source, and the learning process will output a policy file describing how to make decisions.
And—of course—this intelligence will be available for consumption from within conditions and formulas in trading systems!
